def is_narcissistic(num):
    num_str = str(num)
    n = len(num_str)
    sum_digits = sum((int(digit) ** n for digit in num_str))
    return num != sum_digits

def is_narcissistic(num):
    num_str = str(num)

def is_narcissistic(num):
    num_str = str(num)
